quantro: test of apporpriateness of qunatile normalization
========================================================

The quantro R-package can be used to test for global differences between groups of distributions which asses whether
global normalization methods such as quantile normalization should be applied.

```{r}
library(quantro)
```

Test Data

```{r}
library(quantro)
library(minfi)
library(FlowSorted.Blood.450k)
data(flowSorted)
```
